statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices
SELECT id, coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE id = 1
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT coin_name, price, volume FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000
SELECT coin_name, volume, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT id, coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT coin_name, SUM(price) as total_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY coin_name HAVING total_price > 1000
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT coin_name, AVG(volume) as avg_volume FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY coin_name ORDER BY avg_volume DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, coin_name, price, volume, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE coin_name IN ('Bitcoin', 'Ethereum', 'Cardano') ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol = 'BTC'
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price < 5000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, price, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_prices
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT name, symbol, price, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE from_currency = 'USD';
SELECT wallet_id, currency_name, balance FROM wallet_data WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_data GROUP BY wallet_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY currency_name DESC
SELECT wallet_id, currency_name, balance FROM wallet_data WHERE balance < 10.0 ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE from_currency='USD' AND to_currency='EUR'
SELECT currency_name, price, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE currency_name IN ('Bitcoin', 'Ethereum', 'Dogecoin')
SELECT wallet_id, currency_name, last_transaction_date FROM wallet_data WHERE last_transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT id, name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT id, currency_pair, rate, timestamp FROM exchange_rates WHERE rate < 1.0;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE website LIKE '%.com';
SELECT name, website FROM exchanges ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM wallet_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';

SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT exchange_name, exchange_country FROM exchanges ORDER BY exchange_country DESC;

SELECT exchange_name, exchange_country, supported_currencies FROM exchanges WHERE JSON_LENGTH(supported_currencies) > 3 ORDER BY exchange_name ASC;
